about.details:
Incorporated in 1990, Updater Services Limited offers facility management services and business support services ("BSS"). The company operates in the Business-to-Business ("B2B") services space offering a spectrum of business services, which are broadly classified into the two following segments: 1. IFM & Other Services Segment; and 2. BSS Segment.

In FM & Other Services Segment; Production Support Services, Soft Services, Engineering Services, Washroom and Femmenine Hygiene, Warehouse management, General Staffing and more.

In the BSS segment, the company offers Audit and Assurance services through the Subsidiary, Matrix. UDS also offer employee background verification check services, airport ground handling services, sales enablement services and more through its subsidiaries.

As of June 30, 2023, UDS served 2,797 customers across various sectors, including certain global and Indian customers such as Procter & Gamble Home Products Limited ("P&G"), Aditya Birla Fashion and Retail Limited ("ABFRL"), Microsoft, Hyundai Motor India Limited ("Hyundai"), Saint-Gobain India Private Limited and more.

Updater Services Limited is a pan India player, with a widespread network consisting of 4,331 locations (excluding staffing locations) managed from 129 points of presence with 116 offices situated in India and 13 offices situated overseas, as of June 30, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the Updater Services IPO?
faqs.answer:
Updater Services IPO is a main-board IPO of 21333333 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹640.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹300 per share. The minimum order quantity is 50.

The IPO opens on September 25, 2023, and closes on September 27, 2023.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in Updater Services IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Updater Services IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Updater Services IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Updater Services IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Updater Services IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Updater Services IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Updater Services IPO opens on September 25, 2023 and closes on September 27, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Updater Services IPO?
faqs.answer: Updater Services IPO lot size is 50, and the minimum amount required is ₹15,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Updater Services IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Updater Services IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Updater Services IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Updater Services IPO will be done on Thursday, September 28, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, October 3, 2023. Check the Updater Services IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Updater Services IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Updater Services IPO listing date is on Wednesday, October 4, 2023.
